-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Simple and incomplete Excel file templater
--   
--   Library for creating xlsx data files from xlsx tempaltes.
@package xlsx-templater
@version 0.0.1

module Codec.Xlsx.Templater
data Orientation
Rows :: Orientation
Columns :: Orientation
data TemplateSettings
TemplateSettings :: Orientation -> Int -> TemplateSettings
tsOrientation :: TemplateSettings -> Orientation

-- | repeated row/column (depending on <a>tsOrientation</a>)
tsRepeated :: TemplateSettings -> Int

-- | data row as a map from template variable name to a
--   <a>TemplateValue</a>
type TemplateDataRow = Map Text TemplateValue
data TemplateValue
TplText :: Text -> TemplateValue
TplDouble :: Double -> TemplateValue
TplLocalTime :: LocalTime -> TemplateValue

-- | template runner: reads template, constructs new xlsx file based on
--   template data and template settings
run :: FilePath -> FilePath -> [(TemplateDataRow, TemplateSettings, [TemplateDataRow])] -> IO ()
instance Show Orientation
instance Eq Orientation
instance Show TemplateValue
instance Show Converter
instance Show TplCell
